name: Item wise Master Case Sales
query:
SELECT 
Flavor as 'Flavor:Data:250',
ItemGroup as 'Item Group:Data:120',
sum(MasterCase) as 'MasterCase:Float:120',
SUM(Boxes) as 'Boxes:Float:80',
SUM(Carton) as 'Carton:Float:80',
SUM(Qty) as 'Total Qty:Float:120',
((sum(MasterCase)*6) + (SUM(Boxes)*0.25) + (SUM(Carton)*0.5)) 'Total Weigth(Kg):Float:120'
from 
(
select 
item.item_code,
TRIM(SUBSTRING(item.item_code, 1,  (LOCATE('-',item.item_code)-1))) as 'Flavor',
item.item_group as "ItemGroup",
item.stock_uom as "UOM:Data:100",
CASE item.stock_uom
WHEN 'BOX'
	THEN 
	CASE IT.weight_per_unit 
		WHEN 0.25 THEN round(coalesce(sum(item.qty),0),2) DIV 24
		ELSE round(coalesce(sum(item.qty),0),2)
	END		
WHEN 'CARTON'
	THEN 
	CASE IT.weight_per_unit 
		WHEN 0.5 THEN  round(coalesce(sum(item.qty),0),2) DIV 12
		ELSE round(coalesce(sum(item.qty),0),2)
	END	
WHEN 'MASTER CASE'
	THEN round(coalesce(sum(item.qty),0),2)
	ELSE 0
END
as "MasterCase",
CASE item.stock_uom
WHEN 'BOX'
	THEN 
	CASE coalesce(sum(item.qty),0) DIV 24 
		WHEN 0  THEN MOD(round(coalesce(sum(item.qty),0),2), 24) 
		ELSE 0
	END
ELSE 0 
	END	 AS 'boxes',
CASE item.stock_uom
WHEN 'CARTON'
	THEN 
	CASE coalesce(sum(item.qty),0) DIV 12 
	WHEN 0  THEN  MOD(round(coalesce(sum(item.qty),0),2), 12)
	ELSE 0
	END
ELSE 0	
END as 'Carton',
round(coalesce(sum(item.qty),0),2) AS Qty
from `tabSales Invoice` si
inner join `tabSales Invoice Item` item 
ON si.name = item.parent
AND si.docstatus = 1
AND item.item_group in (select name from `tabItem Group` where parent_item_group in ('FINISHED GOODS', 'TOBACCO'))
INNER JOIN `tabItem` IT
ON IT.item_code = item.item_code
WHERE (IT.weight_per_unit  <> 0.0500 )
AND si.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and si.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
group by item.item_code, item.item_group, item.stock_uom 
) as FinalResult
GROUP BY Flavor,ItemGroup
ORDER BY Flavor,ItemGroup
